column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Flying in an airplane is a great way to see someone in a far away place .
#id=2
#text=I search my tickets online , either by going through a third party company like CheapOFlights or going to the flight company 's website directly , like Delta.com .
#id=3
#text=I find the best prices for the date and time I would like to leave my place of origin and land at my destination .
#id=4
#text=I find that it is cheaper to do it at least two weeks ahead of time for the best price .
#id=5
#text=Within a week of my flight I prepare by packing my clothes and any other necessary items in a maximum of two bags .
#id=6
#text=The day of the flight I strive to get to the airport two hours before my flight is scheduled to leave .
#id=7
#text=Once I am at the airport I park , then bring my luggage through checkout and confirm and receive my ticket .
#id=8
#text=After checkout I get checked by security .
#id=9
#text=Afterwards I go to my gate and wait for my plane to load when they call my seat section listed on my flight ticket .
#text=Once in the plane , I either sleep , read a book , or listen to music when the pilot okays it .
#text=It is a very safe and fun experience !
